title: Highest Diabetes Prevalence
description: In 2021, 30.8% of Pakistan's population aged 20 to 79 was affected by diabetes, one of the highest rates globally.

title: Lowest Use of Insecticide-Treated Bed Nets
description: In 2018, only 0.4% of Pakistan's under-5 population used insecticide-treated bed nets, indicating very low usage.

title: High Debt Service Ratio
description: In 2023, Pakistan's debt service was 37.01% of its exports of goods, services, and primary income, a significant financial burden.
